::FZ::

FZ looks down at Najah, shaking his head. "No, we don't fire. The 
Maximals are untrained and do not follow orders, that doesn't mean we 
can disregard orders, though."

He activates his comm and replies to Feline. "Yes, we will go back to 
base soon. Do not fire on the Maximals."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Najah/Feline::
> 
> Feline used her comm link and asked to FZ "Will we cease the fire 
and 
> come back to our base commander???"
> 
> 
> Najah answered to FZ "How's that SSSSSir?, we can desssstroy them 
now 
> and do you let them alive ssssir? OHHHHH pleassssse jusssst let me 
> kill a litte bird that I ssssseee here... he mussssst be here some 
> where... Pleasssse May I kill him???
